episodes.synopsis: From the tree tops to the forest floor, the Amazon is the richest ecosystem on Earth, a powerhouse of evolution that's home to a third of all species.
episodes.title: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds

episodes.synopsis: Covering vast swaths of Argentina and Chile, Patagonia is a land of extremes: ice fields, snow-capped mountains, windswept deserts and violent oceans.
episodes.title: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth

episodes.synopsis: Journey along the Orinoco, the Venezuelan river that explorers believed would lead them to El Dorado, a legendary city of gold.
episodes.title: Venezuela: The Wild Treasures of El Dorado

episodes.synopsis: Each year, the Pantanal wetlands are drowned by floods, then parched by drought, making it a host for some of the world's most fascinating wildlife.
episodes.title: The Pantanal: Brazil's Wild Heart

episodes.synopsis: The longest mountain chain in the world, the Andes run the length of South America and host an assortment of indigenous people and colorful wildlife.
episodes.title: The Andes: World in the Clouds

video.title: Wildest Latin America
video.synopsis: From the snowy Andes to the sweltering Amazon, Latin America is a land of extremes, and this series explores the people and animals that call it home.
